Package service

Class CompanyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.CompanyService

  • public class CompanyService
extends java.lang.Object
    CompanyService is the class that enables to performs action on the database computer. A CompanyService is characterized by the following informations:
    • A companyService
    • A databaseService
    Author:
    elgharbi
